mapper.insert:
SELECT NEXTVAL('sms_msg_sq01') AS msgkey
INSERT INTO SMS_MSG ( /* AdminCommonBaseTrxMapper.insertInitPassWordSms */ MSGKEY , REQDATE , STATUS , TYPE , PHONE , CALLBACK , MSG , ETC1 , ETC2 , ETC3 ) VALUES ( #{msgkey} , NOW() , '1' , '0' , REPLACE(REPLACE(#{phone},'-',''),' ','') , REPLACE(REPLACE(#{callback},'-',''),' ','') , #{msg} , '' , '' , '' )
mapper.select: select '홍길동만만세' as userNmKr , 'William' as userNmEn , '20210318' as userBirth , '0011034168233' as userRrn , '567' as userPhoneNum , '1234' as userMobileNum , '서울특별시 종로구 사직로8길 60 (세종로)' as userAddress , '3층 304호' as userAddressDtl , '192.168.2.31' as userIP , '2001:0DB8:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF' as userIP2 , 'kimdd@naver.com' as userEmail , 'N.J.Kim' as userID , '1234567890' as userActn , '1234567890123456' as userCard
select 'Bhh2286IUx7Zu+ArILz/GzbnOgbixcX/XBzp5Ayib0o=' as userNmKr , '+paIGZZLWqOOnWE982Wt+g==' as userNmEn , '39743ffcfb179ceba590b68fff1a7c65a9db72b3a5ad63ee01a66c6896a07311' as userPw
